name: Oculum Dead
description:
Sometimes death knock's, to the door and drags you down to the Abyss. But, only you decide your fate, will you return to the land of the living or you will stay in oblivion.

That is what happened with a young girl Stephanie. One day she just walk down the street on her work, but this morning she had a bad luck, this morning she faced the long hand of death. Now Stephanie must to decide what way she will chose. Could she find a way out? It's depend only on her decisions.
